actions.text: Amendment SA 807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 807 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration:  CR S6895; text:  CR S6895) To make available, with an offset, $2,100,000 from amounts available for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force for Major T&E Investment (PE 0604759F) for research and development on magnetic levitation technologies at the high speed test track at Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 807 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To make available, with an offset, $2,100,000 from amounts available for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Air Force for Major T&E Investment (PE 0604759F) for research and development on magnetic levitation technologies at the high speed test track at Holloman Air Force Base, New Mexico.
